title: Celebrities Trash Neil Gorsuch: Suggest He Uses Gay Sex App, ‘Anti-LGBTQ,’ ‘Terrifying’
body: Celebrities rushed to social media Tuesday and trashed President Donald Trump’s pick ofJudge Neil Gorsuchto fill the vacant Supreme Court seat.Talk show host and strident anti-Trump critic Chelsea Handler quipped: “Like all arch conservatives, I assume Gorsuch will be celebrating tonight on Grindr,” a suggestion that the Supreme Court nominee uses a gay sex app.Gorsuch, who was praised bypro-life groupsandseveral conservative lawmakers, was held up by Hollywood’s most famous stars as an “embarrassing” example of the U.S. justice system who has been “trotted out like a game show prize.”Below is a roundup of the worst personal insults hurled at Judge Gorsuch by some of the biggest names in entertainment.https://twitter.com/hillharper/status/826604121255981056?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfwhttps://twitter.com/shannonwoodward/status/826596914674044929?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfwhttps://twitter.com/shannonwoodward/status/826600238697680896?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfwhttps://twitter.com/shannonwoodward/status/826617460094705664?ref_src=twsrc%5EtfwFollowJerome Hudsonon Twitter:@jeromeehudson
